title: Spinning the Roulette Wheel and the Law of Large Numbers
question_text:
In the game of American roulette, a small ball will randomly land inside one of $38$ colored and numbered pockets on a spinning wheel. Two of these numbered pockets are green, $18$ are red, and $18$ are black. In a large casino, the wheel is spun several hundred times per day.
Based on the Law of Large Numbers, which of the following situations is most likely to occur?
